website_summaries.verdict: If you absolutely need to economize on space, this is your best pick.
pros: Very small width, but still enough depth to be able to wash hands and face
Great for a very small guest bath or half bath
cons: Small size means you need to watch faucet size closely
Maximum length for faucet should be 4 inches

customer_reviews.title: Nice little sink!
customer_reviews.text: We really like the size of this sink (which fits into our small bath area). Our older home had a huge pedestal sink taking up too much space, so we pulled it out, attached planks of wood to the wall, then had the Barclay installed higher up (for taller people who want easier access). We installed the HOOPLLYS single handle antique copper faucet, which fits nicely and looks vintage. Giving the sink 5 stars for those who want an old-fashioned look in a smaller space.
customer_reviews.author: Artist

customer_reviews.title: Tiny - Good Finish - Solved our space problem.
customer_reviews.text: Just enough room to get your hands in the bowl however its enough to shave and wash your face. It was a must for the space we had. Finish has lasted well and it solved our problem. Get the sink first then wisely choose a faucet as you don't want anything to intrude on the bowl space. The only negative is its so small you drip a little water on the floor occasionally. I would buy this again but it is tiny.
customer_reviews.author: J. Welker

customer_reviews.title: If you are like me and too dumb to build your 1/2 bathroom ...
customer_reviews.text: If you are like me and too dumb to build your 1/2 bathroom large enough this is a perfect little sink
customer_reviews.author: Jeffery K

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for small spaces.
customer_reviews.text: Great little sink for a tiny/half bathroom. Pairs nicely with the Decor Star BRG01-SB faucet and pop-up drain stopper. If you experience splashing due to too much water pressure, turn down the supply valves and that will avoid the splashing from your faucet.
customer_reviews.author: Mohan D.

customer_reviews.title: Great tiny sink.
customer_reviews.text: Cute tiny little sink. Looks great in our tiny cabin bathroom. Was packed to survive anything the shipper could throw at it.
customer_reviews.author: Msdeeds

customer_reviews.title: Great sink for price
customer_reviews.text: Love this little sink and how it fit in our tiny bathroom. The only thing is the mold must have gotten filled in. In the back, a molded piece stuck out, not letting the sink slide on. We had to cut the metal piece off so it would only slide down far enough to miss the imperfection.
customer_reviews.author: aec7777

customer_reviews.title: It gets the guest's attention
customer_reviews.text: This is a cute little sink. It was easy to install. We have it in our tiny guest bathroom so it is only used to wash hands. If you are looking to do more than that, you may want to consider getting something a little bigger. As crazy as it sounds, everyone that comes over is mesmerized with it and wants one for their guest bathroom!
customer_reviews.author: Des Des

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a little sink for a tiny bathroom. This fit's the bill and was less expensive than I had seen it other places. It is a very nice little sink. Cute is an odd word for a sink but it fits!
customer_reviews.author: J. Leblanc

customer_reviews.title: The sink works perfect for the small half bath- order through Amazon Prime ...
customer_reviews.text: The sink works perfect for the small half bath- order through Amazon Prime and recived it in a day. No instruction were in the box but I downloaded them on line - I would do that to prior tontry to install - it will help!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Richard Crabtree II

customer_reviews.title: Tiny But perfectly tiny!
customer_reviews.text: The sink is super small but that's what I needed for the room I put it in! Works perfectly I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Wendy J Davis

customer_reviews.title: Great sink, fits great in my ultra small bathroom
customer_reviews.text: Great sink, fits great in my ultra small bathroom. Quality made but boy is it small. Everyone calls it my "rinse and spit" sink. I would recommend this sink if you have tight quarters.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Small but fits perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Works perfect for our half bath that had limited space.
customer_reviews.author: Mindy L.

customer_reviews.title: Single hole bath sink
customer_reviews.text: The tiny size was exactly what I was looking for, otherwise the half-bath was practically unusable with a larger sink. I could not be happier with the size or the quality.
customer_reviews.author: sandy W.

customer_reviews.title: So Cute!
customer_reviews.text: This sink is ADORABLE and well worth the money. It was easy for my installer to install.
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This sink is perfect for a small bathroom. It doesn't take up much room but is big enough for hand washing, brushing teeth,etc. It is very attractive as well.
customer_reviews.author: Carol S.

customer_reviews.title: Came promptly and in good shape. Was exactly as described and what I ...
customer_reviews.text: Came promptly and in good shape. Was exactly as described and what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Perfect sink for small restroom
customer_reviews.text: Sink is small but very functional. If you have a small space restroom then this is the sink for you.
customer_reviews.author: David C.

customer_reviews.title: BIG value for a smaller sink
customer_reviews.text: Great little sink for tight spaces. Easy assembly with the included steel brackets. Definitely happy!
customer_reviews.author: MikeH

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size, quality looks good, arrived on time and in great condition
customer_reviews.text: Note: I bought this for a home addition project and I have NOT yet installed it. From outward appearances, I am very happy so far.
customer_reviews.author: Frazzled Dad

customer_reviews.title: good little sink
customer_reviews.text: Great little sink if you have a small bathroom. worked perfect for us. Is good quality and easy to hang. am very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: troy s anderson

customer_reviews.title: Nice but really small
customer_reviews.text: Beware of how small this thing is if you don't want something tiny. For me this is what I needed because of my small bathroom but I wish I had more room because this sink is barley big enough to fit my hands in under the faucet. Easy install and faucet sold separately.
customer_reviews.author: J. Moore

customer_reviews.title: Very cute
customer_reviews.text: It is so cute, could not have asked for a more perfect purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Faulkner

customer_reviews.title: Great small sink
customer_reviews.text: Just put in good mono facet and this sink will do well in any small bathroom/utility room space. It is large enough for big hands. Well made. And all needed hardware.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Augenblick

customer_reviews.title: Super faster delivery! Excelent conditions!
customer_reviews.text: People love this sink as you said! this is so cute and small excellent for my space (little tiny bathroom make in a closet). I put an high fixture as recommended and work great! Thanks I will buy more with you in the future!
customer_reviews.author: Pilar

customer_reviews.title: Barclay 4-551WH Tina Wall Hung Lavatory, Right faucet hole.
customer_reviews.text: The package did not come with installation instructions. The on line pdf installation instruction does not have pictures so you have to guess at where the brackets should mount (not too difficult). I am using it as a utility sink as my garage is small. So I installed a tall faucet of I can fit a bucket in. There's not much room to turn the large nut that mounts the faucet, so I ended up turning the faucet to tighten it. The means you better install the faucet before you mount the sink on the wall.
customer_reviews.author: R. Shen

customer_reviews.title: Small, yes.  Good, yes.
customer_reviews.text: As expected. It is impossible to wash your face without splashing all over the floor, however.
customer_reviews.author: David B.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: not installed yet but I love the way it looks.
customer_reviews.author: Karal Schuknecht
